name: Squarivator 2
description:
Introducing Squarivator 2, a simple game made in about 5 hours with the singular purpose of seeing what could be made in such a short period of time. Everything in the game (except the font) was made in less than 300 minutes.

Transport passengers to different floors by way of three manually-controlled elevators. As you transport them, they will become more numerous—how long can you keep the building running smoothly?

Controls

ActionKeySelect CarQ, W, EMove UpR, Up, Mouse WheelMove DownF, Down, Mouse WheelMove to Floor1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6LoadSpace, EnterForce Unload¹ Shift, Delete, Backspace

¹ Passengers disembark automatically on a timer, but the process can be sped up with this key.

This game is considered complete and will likely not be updated.
